title: OPEC attends ADIPEC 2021â€™s opening, participates in high-level discussions
description: Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates, 15 November 2021--OPEC Secretary General, HE Mohammad Sanusi Barkindo, attended the opening ceremony of the 2021 edition of the Abu Dhabi International Petroleum Exhibition and Conference (ADIPEC) in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates (UAE).
